TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSourceAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Attribute that contains information about a Workflow markup file. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string fileName, string md5Digest) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the file name of the mark up file.
A string representing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowMarkupSourceAttribute.MD5Digest%2A>for the file.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the values of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowMarkupSourceAttribute.FileName%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowMarkupSourceAttribute.MD5Digest%2A>.
Gets the name of the file represented by this instance.
Docs.value: The name of the file represented by this instance

Docs.summary: Gets the MD5 hash algorithm computed checksum that is associated with the workflow markup source file.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that contains the checksum associated with the workflow markup source file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This value is used to compare if the workflow markup file has been changed.
